title: Length Of Day Calculator
calculator:
This is a calculator for calculating the length of time at the given location and date.
 Please use the EPSG:4326 coordinate system.
map:
You can choose the coordinates on the map by dragging the marker to the destination.
 The map is provided by OpenLayers.
chart:
In order to see the results you must choose the desired period and a location. Excel file name (location) is provided by api.bigdatacloud.  
 The diagram is provided by Apache Echarts.
